title: EQT closing in on Aavas Financiers, Rs 7,000 cr deal up for grabs
description: Bain, CVC Capital also in fray; 51% stake in play in 2nd largest Housing Finance company as current promoters Kedaara & Partners Group seek to exit 8 year old investment.
